mapper.select: SELECT career_no careerNo, career_content careerContent, career_startdate careerStartDate, career_enddate careerEndDate FROM career ORDER BY career_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT career_no careerNo, career_content careerContent, career_startdate careerStartDate, career_enddate careerEndDate FROM career WHERE account_id = #{accountId} ORDER BY career_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO career ( account_id accountId, career_content careerContent, career_startdate careerStartDate, career_enddate careerEndDate ) VALUES ( #{accountId}, #{careerContent}, #{careerStartDate}, #{careerEndDate}" )
